content: this is a bow for the person who can never have enough bows you can put a pin in it and wear it in your hair or make a bunch to use as festive holiday decor the bow full of bows is worked flat in two parts the ribbon and the knot which is then seamed and the ribbon is pulled through the knot to create the bow shape since it s worked with worsted weight yarn it knits up very quickly and makes great use of any leftover yarns from previous projects it s bows all the way down with this one **notions ** darning needle horizontal matress stitch tutorial https //youtu be/ps-sxbo6o_8 t=138&si=mlnx7vizvrebh7al
